content 2: At , it’s all about women who move, whatever ‘movement’ means for you. We craft premium-quality women’s activewear, keeping three key features in mind- the fit, the fabric, and the functionality. We focus on creating multifunctional activelife wear for women rather than regular women’s sportswear and activewear for women that limit you to the gym or the tracks. Whether you wish to purchase regular gym wear for women or want something that could take you through all your routes and routines, BlissClub adds ceaseless comfort for all your moves.
